price: زموږ ربه! ما ته بخښنه وكړې، مور او پلار ته مې او مومنانو ته، هغه ورځ چې حساب قائميږي.
arabic: رَبَّنَا ٱغۡفِرۡ لِي وَلِوَٰلِدَيَّ وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلۡحِسَابُ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā igh'fir lī waliwālidayya walil'mu'minīna yawma yaqūmu al-ḥisābu
